title: Ghosty Angels Character Pack
description: Low Poly Character Pack of Ghosty Angels game ready: rigged, animated, with morph target
longDescription:
• Showcase video

This is a set of characters: ghosts with angel wings - cute and pretty - rigged, animated and morph-targeted

You can create a full society of ghosts (or angels?) - of different professions and cultures in some magical world.

Using accessories and materials you can change the appearance of the base mesh to customize a character.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  character customization using accessories
  •  character body parts customization using materials (color and emissive)
  •  different example of character customization
  • examples of using morph target to create emotions
  • demo widget shows all morphs, animations and using accessories
  • animation Blueprint and Blendspaces with basic features included (walk, run, jump, fly mode)

Scaled to Epic skeleton: No

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of characters: 1 base skeletal mesh + 17 accessories

Vertex counts of characters: 2049 (base character), 42-1249 (accessories)

Texture Resolutions: 1024 and 2048

Number of Animations: 14 unique (20 total)

Supported Development Platforms: PC

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC


Update 2

The following animations were edited so there won't be any hitches if there are looped:

  • Idle
  • Greetings
  • Give item
  • Take item
  • Sick

Update 1

  • fixed skeletal meshes was not visible in mobile preview
  • change asset type to "add to project"
